pr_title: Add test to verify canonical IDs are stable

timeline.message: Add test to verify canonical IDs are stable

timeline.author: wilhuff

replies.bodyText: Done (by the way: matching the ArraySortedMap name is going to be fun)
replies.author: schmidt-sebastian

timeline.message: Use different values for GeoPoint and Timestamp

timeline.bodyText:
Thanks for adding this test!
It's the Target's canonical ID that is used in Target cache. Query canonical ID is only used in SpecTestCase and I have a TODO to remove it all together.
Can you test Target.getCanonicalId() instead? Thanks!
timeline.author: wu-hui

replies.bodyText: Done. It makes me wish we had a test class for Target though.
replies.author: schmidt-sebastian
